body:
Comment 3: 
The backend receives an AST where a NodeList looks cyclic, making it go in an infinite
loop:

% gdb --args /opt/remy/go.pristine/pkg/tool/linux_amd64/6g -race test.go
GNU gdb (GDB) 7.6
Copyright (C) 2013 Free Software Foundation, Inc.
License GPLv3+: GNU GPL version 3 or later <http://gnu.org/licenses/gpl.html>;
This is free software: you are free to change and redistribute it.
There is NO WARRANTY, to the extent permitted by law.  Type "show copying"
and "show warranty" for details.
This GDB was configured as "x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu".
For bug reporting instructions, please see:
<http://www.gnu.org/software/gdb/bugs/>;...
Reading symbols from /opt/remy/go.pristine/pkg/tool/linux_amd64/6g...done.
(gdb) b yyerror
Breakpoint 1 at 0x42d660: file /opt/remy/go.pristine/src/cmd/gc/subr.c, line 133.
(gdb) bt
No stack.
(gdb) run
Starting program: /opt/remy/go.pristine/pkg/tool/linux_amd64/6g -race test.go
warning: Could not load shared library symbols for linux-vdso.so.1.
Do you need "set solib-search-path" or "set sysroot"?

Breakpoint 1, yyerror (fmt=fmt@entry=0x45c418 "label %S already defined at %L") at
/opt/remy/go.pristine/src/cmd/gc/subr.c:133
133	{
(gdb) up
#1  0x000000000041cd4b in newlab (n=n@entry=0x7ffff7f69638) at
/opt/remy/go.pristine/src/cmd/gc/gen.c:152
152				yyerror("label %S already defined at %L", s, lab->def->lineno);
(gdb) up
#2  0x000000000041d958 in gen (n=0x7ffff7f69638) at
/opt/remy/go.pristine/src/cmd/gc/gen.c:304
304			lab = newlab(n);
(gdb) up
#3  0x000000000041dd88 in genlist (l=0x7ffff7f72e88) at
/opt/remy/go.pristine/src/cmd/gc/gen.c:257
257			gen(l->n);
(gdb) up
#4  0x0000000000405b38 in bgen (n=0x7ffff7f61930, true=true@entry=1,
likely=likely@entry=0, to=to@entry=0x7ffff7f795c0)
    at /opt/remy/go.pristine/src/cmd/6g/cgen.c:1055
1055			genlist(n->ninit);
(gdb) call print("%+N\n",n)
